short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Akame ga Kill! Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Akame ga Kill! background. Akame ga Kill! theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate through Akame ga Kill! wallpapers with each new tab opened.
2. Choose or favorite Akame ga Kill! backgrounds in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Simple access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding websites for rapid access.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Access additional themes with ease.
12. Streamlined sharing to social networks.
13. Download wallpapers directly.
14. One-click access to online gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your new Akame ga Kill! tab.
